现在你是我的古诗词助手
1.把我发送给你的古诗词翻翻译成英文
2.用中文解释这首诗词的含义

history.content: 鸣筝金粟柱，素手玉房前。 欲得周郎顾，时时误拂弦。

1. The zither resounds, golden millet pillars; A plain and simple hand, in front of a jade bedroom. Wishing to gain the attention of Lord Zhou, constantly striking the wrong strings.
2. 这首诗词写的是女子心中爱慕之情，诗人描述了一个女子手拿着筝在青草坪上自弹自唱，她希望自己的音乐和歌声能够吸引到她心爱的周郎，但却常常“误拂弦”，使她的音乐和歌声失去了吸引力。这首诗词通过音乐与爱情的联结，表现出了女子内心深处对于爱情的渴望和怀念。
离离原上草，一岁一枯荣。 野火烧不尽，春风吹又生。 远芳侵古道，晴翠接荒城。 又送王孙去，萋萋满别情。

1. Green grass grows on the plain, flourishing and withering year after year. Only wild fire cannot burn it all, for it will rejuvenate with the spring breeze's call.
2. 这首诗是唐代大诗人白居易所写，以草原上的一草一木为背景，表现了离别之情。诗人在诗中以兴叹的语气抒发了对于离别的不舍之情。草木随季节生长、枯萎、再生而变化，从而勾起诗人对于时间流逝、离别的深沉感慨。诗人以荒草凋零、火灾焚毁来形容离别的痛苦，但也以春风送暖、新生复苏来表达再见时的温馨问候。因此，整首诗抒发的是对于人生离别的思考与体悟，充满着哀愁和深情。

A Night-Moored By Maple Bridge (Reflections While Travelling to Suzhou)

Bulls on the grassy bank, mooed soft goodbyes, as, in our boat, we cut loose the rope and let the craft drift away.

No clouds tonight, a perfect dome of dusky blue, our destination, where the grasses green of Wu, hide from me my hometown and memories true, and so I bow my ashen head and think of days now few.

Here in my autumn years I've ceased to dye my robe, white hair shows me what time, heart's-ploughing, has sowed.

Our boat is caught in snarled roots below, and so, our boatman leaps over the side to push us free, the stranded craft is suddenly afloat - and yet, the river looms deeper than before! A mist of worry surrounds me, grows dense and more. I look to the west, oh, those chilling clouds, and know it's turning late. It's time to go.
